scenario_text.value:
(I quickly got everyone together, and they
were all thrilled by Agumon’s discovery.)

Those towers send cell signals too, right? If
we go there, our phones might start working!

And I bet from a tall building like that, we
could get a great view of our surroundings!
Just how tall is it?
It’s super tall!

Falcomon, you saw it too, right? How tall
would you say it was?

Well, it’s hard to say with no comparison,
but it was taller than this school.
If it’s that big, then there’s no doubt.
Do you think it’s working?

That I do not know. After all, none of us
have even heard of these towers before.

Well, if we went there we could find out. Who
knows, maybe there’s someone there.

Yeah, sitting around talking about it isn’t
going to do us much good.

Then it sounds like we’re in for a hike!
Let’s do this, Aoi!
A hike? What do you mean? What kind of hike?
Oh, did we forget to tell you?

The tower is on top of a mountain, through
the forest and over a mountain pass.

Wait, you mean we need to go through the
forest?! You can’t be serious!

This place is crawling with monsters! Just
exploring around here would be risky,

but you want to go climb a mountain? There’s
no way! We should stay here!
Shuuji, you don’t have to get so upset.

Shut up! I don’t want to hear another word
from you!
*sniff*... *sniff*...
It doesn’t matter... Nothing we do matters...
Kew...

Say what you want, Shuuji, but nothing’s
going to change if we just stay here.

What can a bunch of kids do? We need to wait
for the adults to come rescue us!

As if anyone’s even coming... *mumble*
*mumble*

Yeah... Shuuji, you said it yourself.
Nobody’s coming for us.

I never said that! Not out loud! If I did,
that might make it come true...

(Even knowing there wasn’t much chance of
a rescue, none really, Shuuji still hoped.)

I’m... I’m going with you. Labramon, will you
come with me?
You bet I will, Aoi!

Wait, Aoi?! I thought you agreed we should
stay here!
If... If that tower has a cell signal...

That would mean we could contact a teacher
or someone else and call for help.
C-call for help?

Yes, and then wait to be rescued. Are you
really still against this, Shuuji?

You tell him, Aoi! And hey, that means now
a majority of us want to go explore!

I’m interested in this tower too. That puts
me, Minoru, Saki, and Aoi in favor of going.
You can’t be serious!
So, what now, Shuuji?
But...no...

(Shuuji must really not want to go back out
there if he’s still not convinced.)

(If only there were some way to win him
over...)
(Why was he so opposed to exploration again?)
We’ll run low on food?
We might get lost?
He has to get his way?
We might be attacked?
We’ll run low on food?

Don’t worry Shuuji, it might not be much, but
we can bring some food with us.

Is that what you were worried about? I could
teach you about edible plants if you want.
The food was never the issue!
We might get lost?
Is it far from here to the tower?
Uhhh... It might be a bit of a walk?

It is not far. We could explore the area and
be back before sundown.

Well, there you have it. I don’t think we
need to worry about getting lost.
Yeah... I guess not...
He has to get his way?

Shuuji, stubbornly opposing us because you
can’t get your way isn’t going to help.
What?! That’s...that’s not the issue here!

It’s really not, Takuma. Shuuji isn’t that
petty.
That’s right.
We might be attacked?

Agumon, did you spot anything that seemed
dangerous or that might attack us on the way?
Not to worry! We didn’t get attacked once!

I didn’t catch a whiff of anything suspicious
either!

So it’s not dangerous? Sounds like a no-
brainer!
You really think it’s safe?
I guess, in that case...

*sigh* Well, when you put it that way,
I guess I have no reason to stop you.

And it doesn’t make sense for me to stay
here by myself... Okay, let’s go.
Great! That’s all of us!
Hey!
Okay everybody, bye!
Bye...

What are you two talking about? You’re coming
with us.
Huh?

Agreed. Especially considering what happened
yesterday, it’s too dangerous to split up.
No, we’ll be fine. We both want to stay here.
Here...

What will you do if a monster attacks and
it’s just the two of you?
A...monster?

Before you two got here, this place was
a giant spider’s nest. It’s not safe either.
A...a spider?!

And let’s not forget, neither of you have
a partner monster.
Well...uh...maybe not, but...

Don’t worry! Falcomon and me have got your
backs!
Indeed. We will not let any harm come to you.
And I’ll help keep you safe, too!
Never one to be left out, are you?
Yeah, Agumon’s like this all the time.

All right, that makes all of us. We’ll leave
as soon as we’re packed, okay?

Oh, and Ryo, you’ll look after the place
while we’re gone, won’t you?

W-wait! Don’t you go leaving me behind!
I’m going too, okay?!
Why would you take those brats, and not me?!

Oh, come on, Ryo. How’re you so uncooperative
if you can’t handle being on your own?

Aw, it’s all right... At least he’s finally
back to being the Ryo we know.

He’s been a little off lately, but the guy’s
supposed to be bitter and crabby.
If you say so...

Tch... Damn it... I... I’m... *mumble*
*mumble*
